definition.name: NXspm_cantilever_config
definition.doc: This file defines the NXspm_cantilever_config base class, which contains configuration information about the cantilever used in the AFM (atomic force microscopy) experiments.

field.name: cantilever_coating
field.doc: The coating material of the cantilever.

field.name: curvature_radiusN
field.doc: The radius of curvature of the cantilever tip. The (substring) N denotes X or Y.

field.name: cantilever_type
field.doc: The shape of the cantilever as a general text, such as A-shape, beam, or arrow.

field.name: cantilever_length
field.doc: Nominal length between base and end of the cantilever in micrometers.

field.name: cantilever_width
field.doc: Nominal width of the cantilever in microns.

field.name: cantilever_thickness
field.doc: Nominal thickness of the cantilever in microns.

field.name: resonance_frequency
field.doc: Nominal free resonance frequency of the cantilever in air i.e., out of interaction force.

field.name: amplitude_excitation
field.doc: Either the drive amplitude in mv for the driving cantilever or the free-oscillation amplitude which is the resulted movement amplitude without interaction to the surface.

field.name: fermi_level
field.doc: The Fermi level of the cantilever material.

field.name: resonance_amplitude
field.doc: Nominal free resonance amplitude of the cantilever in air, in nm i.e., out of interaction force.

field.name: spring_constant
field.doc: The spring constant coefficient of the cantilever.

group.doc: The calibration information of the cantilever.

field.name: sensitivity
field.doc: A force applied to the cantilever tip will cause a change in cantilever's oscillation amplitude (in dynamic mode) or deflection of the cantilever. The sensitivity of the cantilever is calculated as the ratio of this change to the force causing it.
